---
title: adb 获取 Android 手机本信息
date: 2020-04-01 10:20:16
tags: [Android, Adb]
category: [Android 基本信息, adb]
---

### 如何查看 android 手机 编译信息

编译信息 存储在 `/system/build.prop` 文件中，但是这个文件查看权限需要 **root** 之后才能查看，但是知道 具体属性的名称则可以通过 **adb** 命令查看。

#### 获取 build.prop 文件的内容

1. 创建模拟器;
2. adb shell 进入刚创建的模拟器，执行 `su` 切换到 **root** 权限下面；
3. 打开 `/system/build.prop`
   下面

```
$ adb shell
generic_x86_64:/ $ su
generic_x86_64:/ # pwd
/
generic_x86_64:/ # cat /system/build.prop

# begin common build properties
# autogenerated by build/make/tools/buildinfo_common.sh
ro.system.build.date=Fri Aug  2 05:01:12 UTC 2019
ro.system.build.date.utc=1564722072
ro.system.build.fingerprint=Android/sdk_phone_x86_64/generic_x86_64:10/QPP6.190730.005.B1/5775370:userdebug/test-keys
ro.system.build.id=QPP6.190730.005.B1
ro.system.build.tags=test-keys
ro.system.build.type=userdebug
ro.system.build.version.incremental=5775370
ro.system.build.version.release=10
ro.system.build.version.sdk=29
ro.product.system.brand=Android
ro.product.system.device=generic_x86_64
ro.product.system.manufacturer=unknown
ro.product.system.model=Android SDK built for x86_64
ro.product.system.name=sdk_phone_x86_64
# end common build properties
# begin build properties
# autogenerated by buildinfo.sh
ro.build.id=QPP6.190730.005.B1
ro.build.display.id=sdk_phone_x86_64-userdebug 10 QPP6.190730.005.B1 5775370 test-keys
ro.build.version.incremental=5775370
ro.build.version.sdk=29
ro.build.version.preview_sdk=0
ro.build.version.preview_sdk_fingerprint=REL
ro.build.version.codename=REL
ro.build.version.all_codenames=REL
ro.build.version.release=10
ro.build.version.security_patch=2019-08-01
ro.build.version.base_os=
ro.build.version.min_supported_target_sdk=23
ro.build.date=Fri Aug  2 05:01:12 UTC 2019
ro.build.date.utc=1564722072
ro.build.type=userdebug
ro.build.user=android-build
ro.build.host=abfarm830
ro.build.tags=test-keys
ro.build.flavor=sdk_phone_x86_64-userdebug
ro.build.ab_update=false
# ro.product.cpu.abi and ro.product.cpu.abi2 are obsolete,
# use ro.product.cpu.abilist instead.
ro.product.cpu.abi=x86_64
ro.product.cpu.abilist=x86_64,x86
ro.product.cpu.abilist32=x86
ro.product.cpu.abilist64=x86_64
ro.product.locale=en-US
ro.wifi.channels=
# ro.build.product is obsolete; use ro.product.device
ro.build.product=generic_x86_64
# Do not try to parse description or thumbprint
ro.build.description=sdk_phone_x86_64-userdebug 10 QPP6.190730.005.B1 5775370 test-keys
# end build properties

#
# from build/make/target/board/gsi_system.prop
#
# GSI always generate dex pre-opt in system image
ro.cp_system_other_odex=0

# GSI always disables adb authentication
ro.adb.secure=0

# GSI disables non-AOSP nnapi extensions on product partition
ro.nnapi.extensions.deny_on_product=true

# TODO(b/120679683): disable RescueParty before all problem apps solved
persist.sys.disable_rescue=true

# TODO(b/78105955): disable privapp_permissions checking before the bug solved
ro.control_privapp_permissions=disable

# TODO(b/136212765): the default for LMK
ro.lmk.kill_heaviest_task=true
ro.lmk.kill_timeout_ms=100
ro.lmk.use_minfree_levels=true
# end of build/make/target/board/gsi_system.prop

#
# ADDITIONAL_BUILD_PROPERTIES
#
ro.bionic.ld.warning=1
ro.treble.enabled=true
persist.debug.dalvik.vm.core_platform_api_policy=just-warn
dalvik.vm.lockprof.threshold=500
xmpp.auto-presence=true
ro.config.nocheckin=yes
net.bt.name=Android
generic_x86_64:/ #
```

### adb 获取具体属性内容

注：连接多个设备的时候，需要指定具体设备，-s 设备 ID
查看 android sdk 版本号

```
$  adb -s 0715f7535f8b0d34 shell getprop ro.build.version.sdk
24
```

查看 android 系统版本号

```
$ adb -s 0715f7535f8b0d34 shell getprop ro.build.version.release
7.0
```

查看编译日期

```
$  adb -s 0715f7535f8b0d34 shell getprop ro.build.date
Wed Aug  1 11:13:51 KST 2018
$  adb -s 0715f7535f8b0d34 shell getprop ro.build.date.utc
1533089631
```

查看 支持的 CPU 类型

```
$  adb -s 0715f7535f8b0d34 shell getprop ro.product.cpu.abilist
arm64-v8a,armeabi-v7a,armeabi
```

查看 fingerprint

```
adb -s 0715f7535f8b0d34 shell getprop ro.build.fingerprint
samsung/nobleltezc/nobleltechn:7.0/NRD90M/N9200ZCS3DRH1:user/release-keys
```

### 获取 全部属性

查看全部属性 `adb shell getprop`
